Reviews.Title: Good Deal
Reviews.Author: dubaleeiro
Reviews.Content: Everything occurred as planned. I was just a little upset because days after my purchase the price droped a little bit... Product is just great!

Reviews.Title: Nice phone but...
Reviews.Author: Oscar
Reviews.Content: The phone arrived on time, even earlier than expected. It contained all the accessories, everything was ok until... I saw the battery space empty... opened the device... surprise! No battery!!! Well, now my phone is useless until I get a new battery. I am crossing my fingers, hoping that my phone actually starts once I get the battery. Not sure who took the battery out, but it sure did rain on my parade.

Reviews.Title: Well worth the price
Reviews.Author: Shopaholic lady
Reviews.Content: Got this phone as a gift to my sister and she loved it so much. She now creates her own apps since it runs in windows platform.

Reviews.Title: Windows phones suck
Reviews.Author: Alan Chan
Reviews.Content: Do not buy this phone.  It will freeze on you and not work.So many bugs with Windows 7.Repeat. Do not buy.

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM: 850/900/1800/1900 MHz, HSPA/WCDMA: 900/2100 MHz, Wi-Fi: IEEE 802.11 b/g, Bluetooth 2.1 with A2DP for wireless stereo headsets, GPS with A-GPS support
Camera: 5 MP, 2592 x 1944 pixels, autofocus
Display: 3.2 inches, 320 x 480 pixels, TFT capacitive touchscreen, 65K colors with Sense UI, Multi-touch support, Accelerometer sensor for auto-rotate, Proximity sensor for auto turn-off
Platform: Microsoft Windows Mobile 6.5.3 Professional. CPU: Qualcomm 7227 600 MHz processor. Internal Memory: 384 MB RAM, 512 MB ROM
Features: Stereo FM radio with RDS, MP3/AAC+/WAV/WMA9 player, MP4/H.263/H.264/WMV9/DivX player, Facebook, Flickr, Twitter applications
ProductInfo.Name: HTC HD Mini T5555 Windows Smartphone with 5 MP Camera, Wi-Fi, Touchscreen and Bluetooth--International Version with No Warranty
